Package com.msasc.lib.fx

Class ProgressMonitor

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.fx.ProgressMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProgressListener
public class ProgressMonitor extends Object implements ProgressListener
Utility to monitor the progress of tasks.
Author:
Miquel Sas

    • notifyStart

      public void notifyStart()
      Notify that the calling task has started. The timer is started and scheduled.
      Specified by:
      notifyStart in interface ProgressListener

    • notifyEnd

      public void notifyEnd()
      Notify that the calling task has finished. The timer is cancelled and a last time and progress calculation is done.
      Specified by:
      notifyEnd in interface ProgressListener

    • notifyMessage

      public void notifyMessage(int index, String message)
      Notify a progress message, normally when the task is indeterminate.
      Specified by:
      notifyMessage in interface ProgressListener
      Parameters:
      index - The message index.
      message - The message.

    • notifyProgress

      public void notifyProgress(int index, double workIncrease, double totalWork)
      Notify an increase in the work done. Zero or negative work increases or total work are not considered and skipped. Additionally, in an indeterminate state, work and total are also skipped.
      Specified by:
      notifyProgress in interface ProgressListener
      Parameters:
      index - Progress bar index.
      workIncrease - Work increase.
      totalWork - Total work.

    • setIndeterminate

      public void setIndeterminate(int index, boolean indeterminate)
      Set that the progress bar is indeterminate.
      Specified by:
      setIndeterminate in interface ProgressListener
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the progress bar.
      indeterminate - A boolean.

    • setup

      public void setup(int numLabels, int numBars)
      Initialize and setup the listener to manage the argument number of labels and progress bars.
      Specified by:
      setup in interface ProgressListener
      Parameters:
      numLabels - Number of labels.
      numBars - Number of progress bars.
